DOC.brief_summary: Many patient undergo coronary angiography find significant coronary artery disease ( CAD ) despite angina equivalent symptom and/or electrocardiographic abnormality suggestive myocardial ischemia . The aim study systematically assess patient angina equivalent symptom despite normal coronary angiogram evaluate symptom accord defined algorithm .
DOC.detailed_description: All consecutive patient coronary angiography Luzerner Kantonsspital July 1st 1996 July 31st 2008 significant coronary stenosis ( coronary stenosis ≥ 50 % ) recruit study . Patients extensively examine angiography use acetylcholine infusion fast atrial pacing . According result additional invasive examination ( vasospasm , vasoconstriction , vasodilation ; symptom examination ) distinct diagnosis attribute patient ( small vessel disease , vasospastic disease , hypertensive heart disease , rhythm disorder , extracardiac thoracic pain include pulmonary hypertension ) . Patients followed-up 10 year prognosis patient assess ( include mortality , cardiovascular event , re-angiography , functional status 10 year ) .
